title: [TEST] Expand backend Python test coverage
body:
## Problem
Only 7 Python test files for entire backend. Critical paths untested.

## Tasks
- [ ] Add unit tests for all services
- [ ] Add integration tests for API endpoints
- [ ] Add authentication/authorization tests
- [ ] Add database migration tests
- [ ] Configure pytest coverage reports
- [ ] Add coverage to CI pipeline

## Acceptance Criteria
- Backend coverage > 70%
- All critical paths tested
- CI enforces coverage
- Tests run in < 2 minutes

## Priority: HIGH
## Effort: 21 story points
